backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a multi-tenant task management system with authorization, storing clients, tasks, assignees, and todos per-principal with CRUD operations and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented performance features: pagination/virtual scrolling for tasks, loading skeleton UI, and React Query stale-time configuration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files describing components, pages, hooks, and their functionality including authentication, task management, client management, and UI features.
frontend/.ic-assets.json5: Asset configuration for IC canister defining content types, cache policies (31536000s for static assets, no-cache for HTML), and security headers including CSP and X-Frame-Options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for UI components (sidebar, cards, buttons, charts) using OKLCH color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with enhanced diagnostic logging for asset loading, HTTP 503 error detection, script load failures, and comprehensive environment information for debugging canister service issues.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component with TanStack Router, React Query setup, authentication flow, profile setup modal, 30-second loading timeout detection with comprehensive diagnostics including HTTP 503 error reporting and asset loading analysis.
frontend/src/components/assignees/Assign: Dialog component for bulk uploading assignees via CSV file, with template download, file parsing, validation error display, and submission to backend using useBulkCreateAssignees hook.
Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting individual assignees with form validation for team name and captain fields, using create/update/delete hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that prompts new users to enter their name on first login, using useSaveCallerUserProfile hook and preventing dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Landing page for unauthenticated users featuring CSWA branding, Internet Identity sign-in button, and feature cards describing client management, task tracking, and dashboard capabilities.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: Dialog for bulk uploading clients via CSV with template download, file parsing, validation preview table, and submission using useBulkCreateClients hook.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting individual clients with fields for name, GSTIN, PAN, and notes, including form validation and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppStartu: React error boundary component that catches startup errors, logs detailed error information to console, and displays a StartupErrorScreen with an option to reload the application after clearing storage.
frontend/src/components/errors/StartupEr: Error screen UI component that displays categorized error details (network, auth, backend, navigation), provides troubleshooting steps, and offers actions to reload the app or copy error details to clipboard.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout component with sticky header, navigation sidebar (Dashboard, Clients, Tasks, Assignees, Todos), mobile menu sheet, and user profile dropdown with logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/tasks/InlineComm: Inline editor component for task comments that toggles between display and edit modes, with save/cancel actions and keyboard shortcuts (Enter to save, Escape to cancel).
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Dialog component for bulk editing multiple tasks simultaneously, allowing users to update fields like client, category, status, assignee, dates, and payment details with an unchanged sentinel pattern to preserve unmodified fields.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Dialog component for bulk task creation via CSV upload, featuring template download, file parsing with validation, preview table showing parsed tasks and errors, and sequential task creation with progress feedback.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskDetail: Displays detailed task information in a card layout, including client name, category, status badge, assigned team with captain, dates, financial amounts (bill, advance, outstanding), payment status, and optional comments.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Dialog form for creating and editing tasks with combobox inputs for client, category, subcategory, status, and assignee selection, plus fields for dates, financial data, and comments. Includes validation and auto-calculation of outstanding amounts.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskListSk: Renders an animated skeleton loading state for the task table with configurable row count and optional checkbox columns.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Provides a dropdown select component for quickly updating a task's status inline, using the updateTask mutation and handling null status values with a sentinel.
frontend/src/components/todos/TodoBulkUp: Dialog for bulk uploading todos via CSV file, with template download, file parsing, validation preview table showing valid/invalid rows, and bulk creation functionality.
frontend/src/components/todos/TodoFormDi: Dialog form for creating, editing, and deleting todos with fields for title, description, completed status, priority, and due date, including a confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/constants/taskStatus.ts: Defines allowed task statuses as a constant array, provides normalization functions for legacy status mapping (To Do→Pending, Done→Completed, Blocked→Hold), validation helpers, and a safe coercion function for Select components.
frontend/src/hooks/assignees.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on assignees, including fetching all assignees, fetching a single assignee, creating, updating (with optimistic updates), and deleting assignees with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on clients, including fetching all clients, fetching a single client, creating, updating (with optimistic updates), and deleting clients with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching tasks with captain information, includes pagination utilities, extensive logging for debugging, and configures stale time and cache settings to prevent excessive refetches.
frontend/src/hooks/todos.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on todos, including fetching all todos, fetching a single todo, creating, updating (with optimistic updates), deleting, and bulk creating todos.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializes access control with admin token from URL params, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile, with proper loading state management that accounts for authentication and actor initialization, returning null on error to allow profile setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeferredUrlCleanup: Extracts caffeineAdminToken from URL hash on mount, stores it in sessionStorage, and removes the hash from the URL after a 100ms delay to prevent URL flash.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light and dark themes using a warm neutral, charcoal, and sage green color palette.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Deprecated utility for parsing and encoding client data; now obsolete as Client model uses explicit fields without encoding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AssigneesPage.tsx: Page component for managing assignees with search, bulk selection/deletion, Excel export, and dialogs for creating/editing assignees and bulk uploads.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Detail view for a single client showing client information, associated tasks, with client selector dropdown and edit functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Page component for managing clients with search filtering, bulk selection/deletion, Excel export, and dialogs for creating/editing clients and bulk uploads.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page displaying business metrics summary cards and aggregated task data by category, subcategory, and status with navigation to detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Main tasks page component with filtering, sorting, pagination, bulk operations, and inline editing. Includes URL-based filter initialization and comprehensive query state logging.
frontend/src/pages/TodosPage.tsx: Todos page component with search, completion filtering, bulk selection/deletion, and CRUD operations via dialogs. Displays todos sorted by completion status and creation date.
frontend/src/utils/assetLoadingDiagnosti: Comprehensive asset loading diagnostics utility that intercepts fetch/script errors, with special HTTP 503 detection and detailed error reporting including headers, timing, and response bodies.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: CSV template generation and parsing utilities for assignee bulk upload with validation. Handles Team Name and Captain fields.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeExcel.ts: Excel export utility for assignees that dynamically loads SheetJS library and generates downloadable XLSX files with Team Name and Captain columns.
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: CSV template generation and parsing utilities for client bulk upload with validation. Handles Client Name, GSTIN, PAN, and Notes fields.
frontend/src/utils/clientExcel.ts: Excel export utility for clients that dynamically loads SheetJS library and generates downloadable XLSX files with client details including GSTIN, PAN, and Notes.
frontend/src/utils/taskAggregations.ts: Provides functions to aggregate task data by category, sub-category, status, and combinations thereof, calculating revenue totals and counts. Exports comprehensive task statistics including open/completed counts and various breakdowns.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Handles CSV parsing and validation for bulk task uploads with support for all task fields including dates, financial data, and assignments. Generates CSV templates and validates required fields with detailed error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/taskDisplay.ts: Provides consistent formatting utilities for task display including date conversion from nanosecond timestamps, currency formatting in INR, and assignee name formatting with captain information.
frontend/src/utils/taskExcel.ts: Dynamically loads SheetJS library and exports task data to Excel format with all task fields including dates, financial information, and assignee details with captain names.
frontend/src/utils/taskSort.ts: Implements sorting logic for tasks across multiple fields (dates, status, categories, financial data) with ascending/descending directions, safely handling null/undefined values by pushing them to the end.
frontend/src/utils/todoCsv.ts: Handles CSV parsing, validation, and template generation for bulk todo uploads with support for title, description, completion status, priority, and due dates. Includes quote-aware CSV parsing and conversion to backend input format.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens for a component library.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build configuration for React app with path aliases, dev server on port 3000, API proxy to localhost:4943, and optimized build settings.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document for CSWA Client Management showing three implemented features for task list optimization and one pending backend query performance improvement request.
